nodes.text: Bat'theria was a female Human who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She was a junk dealer, selling her wares at the Lytle Research outpost in the bombed city world of Taris.

Bat'theria first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a junk dealer selling medical equipment on Taris. She also sold a import code, which could be used to open a import crate from Tatooine.
